item.title: HobbyNotebook / Shame Golf (+138)
item.description: Miniature Shame Golf is a game of painting your miniatures.

item.title: Hobby
item.description: I paint small plastic monsters and soldiers for fun. Painting Shame Golf Painting Models (and sometimes food) Only finished models but also videos sometimes Listings (less frequently updated than they used to be) Special Games Workshop models Mortal Realms Magazine Contents Lore and Rules Imperium Magazine Contents Lore and Rules 3D Printing Notes (printer needs to be reset) I use a specific Instagram tag for the finished ones.
